field.label: Enable
field.help: Enable or disable the NextDNS DNS resolver.

field.label: Run as Primary DNS
field.help: Enable if NextDNS is the primary DNS resolver (i.e. will run on port 53). Check file /usr/local/etc/nextdns/nextdns.conf. Ensure that no other application (Unbound, dnsmasq, AdGuardHome) is not running on port 53.
